thread.title: ‘Generous’ Taylor Swift donates $50,000 for her dancer’s nephew’s cancer battle
thread.title_full: ‘Generous’ Taylor Swift donates $50,000 for her dancer’s nephew’s cancer battle | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: ‘Generous’ Taylor Swift donates $50,000 for her dancer’s nephew’s cancer battle
text:
Other Articles 'Talvar' box office collections: Irrfan Khan starrer records 25% occupancy rate on day 1 'Singh Is Bling' box office collections: Akshay Kumar starrer gathers 80% occupancy on day 1 'Girls Next Door' star Bridget Marquardt engaged to beau Nick Carpenter Once again Taylor Swift has shown her charitable side, as she has recently donated 50,000 dollars to her dancer’s infant nephew, who is battling cancer.
The 25-year-old Taylor Swift made the donation on a website named GoFundMe, wrote, “Baby Ayden, I’m lucky enough to perform with your uncle Toshi on tour. All of us are praying for you and your mama and sending so much love your way. Love, Taylor,” on the site, reports E! Online.
Expressing his gratitude over the ‘Bad Blood’ hit-maker’s support, Toshi took to Instagram and wrote, “@Taylorswift is an angel and My family and I can’t thank her enough… She is such an incredible human being, this unexpected gift is truly a blessing.”
First Published on October 01, 2015 5:00 pm
